source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select *,concat('FirstName','MiddleName',
'LastName') as FullName
 from dbo.dimCustomer
where
gender='M'

Select *,concat('FirstName','MiddleName',
'LastName') as FullName from dbo.dimCustomer
where
gender='F'

sources.name: DelimitedText2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DelimitedText2
